title: Graham And Green UMBERTO BRASS CABINET
description: UMBERTO BRASS CABINET  Hand-finished with a brass sheet wrap on a mango wood frame, our deco-inspired Umberto brass cabinet has ample space to keep all your treasured possessions hidden in style. Legs and handles made from lacquered brass-plated iron.  Some simple self-assembly is required to attach the legs.  This product has been cladded with a brass sheet over a wood frame.   We recommend periodically cleaning with a brass cleaning kit.  Please note that cleaning will not prevent metal tarnishing, the colour and finish will change however this piece can be moderately restored to its original state.  To prevent watermarks and heat damage, never place items such as ceramics, tableware or glassware directly onto the surface of any of our wooden furniture without the protection of a heat resistant mat, coaster or trivet. Clean up any spillages immediately to avoid staining.  This product is handmade from natural materials so the exact colour and finish will vary.   Pre-owned excellent condition, there is a slight bit of movement on the wood top left at the back, hardly noticeable, see last image. This is due to the natural mango wood that can expand in different environments.

title: Victorian Cast Iron Fireplace, Log Burner, Seat Guard, Fire Dogs, Superb Set
description: Enhance your home with this magnificent Victorian cast iron fireplace, featuring intricate detailing and timeless craftsmanship. The ornate cast iron surround showcases elegant floral and geometric patterns, adding a touch of historical charm to any space.  This fireplace includes a Broseley ‘Winchester’ solid wood-burning stove, offering both warmth and style. Included is a decorative fireguard seat ledge to perch upon,  which adds an extra layer of safety while complementing the overall aesthetic. The seat is upholstered in a quality plum coloured velvet.  The rich graphite dark grey finish to the surround pairs beautifully with classic and contemporary interiors alike.  A rare and striking centerpiece, this Victorian fireplace is perfect for period properties or anyone looking to add character to their home.  Description of log burner:  The Broseley Winchester wood burning stove incorporates unique side viewing windows so the beauty and warmth of the fire can be seen and felt from all aspects of your living room.  Incorporating highly controllable primary and secondary air-wash features together with a large firebox to accommodate even larger logs the Winchester offers heat outputs of up to 8kw/hr.   Key Features  Optional top and rear outlet  Triple aspect viewing window  Primary air control and secondary air wash feature  Ash pan incorporated underneath the body of the stove  Easily removable Cast Iron fire bricks and baffle (no fixings)  Turning Grate   FUEL TYPE  Wood burning  HEAT OUTPUT  8kW   DIMENSIONS of log burning stove  Height - 605mm  Width - 600mm  Depth - 520mm   FLUE SIZE  125mm   MATERIAL  Cast Iron   WEIGHT  116Kg    ALL DISMANTLED AND READY TO COLLECT   Dimensions Of Fire surround:145cm H x 186cm W mantle x 22cm D  Seat guard size:205cm W x 52cm H   You will receive in this package:  Cast iron Fire surround  2 x cast iron fire dogs  Fire guard seating surround  Broseley Log burner suitable for large room (room size it came out of 30ft x 50ft)  Black granite tiles in front of log burner and tiles to the sides around the opening included  Two part elbow bend flue included, part is attached to the rear of the log burner and one piece is photographed with the granite pieces. You will just require the part that goes up the chimney   The table in the last image, indicates how you can work out if the log burner is an appropriate size for your room.   Any other questions, message Marcia.   NOTE: I can provide a delivery quote for two man delivery, message me with your postcode.  There is a small section that needs welding at the back of the cast iron fire surround, so have reduced the price to reflect this.

title: Luxury Flofa Armchairs, Latorre, Design,Accent Chairs (2) RRP £2,751 Each
description: A pair of identical Latorre accent chairs in excellent condition.  £5,500 purchase price for both chairs   Art Deco / Art Nouveau   Art Deco is a relatively young style that emerged at the beginning of the 20th century. It owes its existence to France and the French, and it used to represent the combination of modern and neoclassical styles in architecture, fashion and art. Then, in the 1970s, the term "Art Deco" was extended to also mean a style of interior design. This style's characteristic feature is the seemingly impossible fusion of classical straight lines and strict forms with the asymmetry of luxury and splendour. Art Deco interior design implies an abundance of expensive, exotic materials, plenty of curved lines, mythical paintings and tapestries of dragons and peacocks. Art Deco is considered to be the most original style of interior design, it leans toward ostentatious luxury and splendour and absolutely does not tolerate asceticism or minimalism. When decorating in this style, designers often use inclusive fountains, podiums, forged lattice, exotic fans, marble decorations and stained glass. Art Deco furniture also has to be unique in appearance and very rich - created using light wood, genuine leather, chromium-plating.  Contemporary / Modern   The contemporary style in a flat is, first and foremost, about compact forms and simple geometry. Modern people are tired of supersaturated decor and complex forms. Modern fashion favours moderate asceticism, cozy family home, introspection, creation of a family's inner world - reliable, calm, peaceful. The pertinence of contemporary style lies in its functionality and coetaneous unpredictability. Nowadays everyone is free to choose their own lifestyle. Each person's creativity and uniqueness determines the inventivess of their home interior.   Colour:Purple  Fabric:luxury velvet  Condition:Immaculate  Size:120cm H x 97cm W x 90cm D   YouTube video link below:   https://youtu.be/4iRf_hXbS3E?si=CwBIj1gl8hDelRxw    The small metal and glass table is also for sale, see my other items available.
